title: Fire Mage

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Start a fire on your target. If someone visits your target while they're burning, the second person will start burning as well.
>
> Disguise as another role in GIM. When you are investigated you will appear as this role. 1 use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: > You attack burning players after 2 days have passed. This attribute will activate even though you're dead.
